ModMetaData.description:
YADA: Yet Another Dev Assistant
0. XML Harmony patches!
1. .rimignore Now you can filter files you upload to Steam, similar to .gitignore. Add default .rimignore file to your mod with a single click.
2. mod size is now shown before upload
3. All dev flags are now saved with the game Like "god mode", "unlimited power", all draw flags, etc etc. Only if dev mode is on.
4. convenient hediff severity +/- buttons
